job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Role can be performed remotely , candidate needs to work US EST hours.</strong></p><p><br></p><p>Working with state of the art technologies as part of AI/ ML platform's team enabling scientists in Drug discovery R&amp;D, Safety, Supply chain, Digital Health.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Key requirements:</strong></p><p>•BS/MS in Computer Science or Computer Engineering</p><p>•6+ years of experience designing &amp; writing production-quality code</p><p>•Good Knowledge of NVIDIA SDKs and HPC parallel systems</p><p>•Excellent C/C++, CUDA and Python programming and software design skills, including debugging, performance analysis, and test</p><p>•Knowledge of AWS/ Azure/ GCP cloud ecosystems to work closely on integration efforts with DevOps engineers</p><p>•Exceptional attention to detail, close engagement in product design, and a constant focus on user experience</p><p>•Strong interpersonal skills are required along with the ability to work in a agile &amp; dynamic product-oriented teams on challenging projects</p><p>•Good verbal and written communication skills in English</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd:</strong></p><p><strong></strong></p><p>•Experience working with NVIDIA/ Xilinx or custom ASIC SDKs</p><p>2+ yrs of experience optimising AI/ ML applications</p>
